notes: The Old Bailey Corpus is a sociolinguistically, pragmatically and textually annotated selection of the Proceedings of the Old Bailey. These speech-related texts document Late Modern English in London's Central Criminal Court from 1720 to 1913
title: The Old Bailey Corpus
